posts.post_content: Now overpaying for any buybacks, as I am working on a set, any help would be appreciated...

Hi Ralph

I have a few buybacks and you are first on my list when I decide to sell them.

If I find upgrades for any of them at the National next week, I will contact you.


Jantz

I have a Topps T206 buyback of Bultler of Rochester, Piedmont 350 back.  Let me know if you're interest and I can send a pic.

-Mike
